name: Archaic Petra
title: Of Mountains Mighty: Archaic Petra
desc: "While the Millelith stands guard, evil shall never prevail!"
inPlayDescription: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Geo Die. (Once per Round)Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Geo.

skills.desc: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Geo Die. (Once per Round)Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Geo.(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
